title: The Future of Science is Female: The Brilliant Minds Shaping the 21st Century
description: Take a look at what the future holds—and how women are making it better. In The Future of Science is Female, author and award-winning journalist Zara Stone shares the fascinating, complicated stories of how a diverse group of powerful women got started—from the perspective of those still working it out as they go along. Take 22-year old Dominique Barnes, a hero of the oceans. She was worried about all the dolphins and whales killed during shrimp farming, so the marine biologist created a tasty, affordable plant-based shrimp alternative.From saving the oceans to improving the rehabilitation and job prospects of people struggling in prison, these badass female scientists and entrepreneurs are changing the world. Real encouragement and inspiration for today's amazing girls. Forget the "ivory tower" of accomplishment. Learn about the drama, tears, and adventures everyday women heroes face as they race to fix everything the world has messed up. The Future of Science is Female, is a highly entertaining and illuminating journey through the true stories of women in STEM, based on Stone’s in-depth reporting on technology, the gender gap, racial bias, and startup innovation. It inspires the future female founders of the world to turn their dreams into reality.
author: Zara  Stone
